about_the_game:
A survivor-style rogue lite action game that gives you a comfortable feeling of being a warrioress. Knock down the onrushing monsters and push forward deep into the enemy territory!
There are a wide variety of potions you can create as you cleared area. Create powerful builds & smash the witch's servants!

Game system


  • Every time you cleared area, you can choose one growth factor with an reinforce potion. The effects are many and varied!
  • As the story progresses, various things are unlocked. The liberated people will help you this time!
  • Tasteful pixel art, sometimes abstract, stirs the imagination.
  • A wealth of achievements. Use them to guide your strategy, or become an achievement hunter!

Story


Claudia the Magician.
A girl who was once held captive by the Witch of Terror and spent her time in a mansion of horrors.
With the power she gained there, she managed to escape.

6 years later.
To put an end to the tragedy she had continued to turn away from.
And to establish herself in the true sense of the word.
She looked up at the mansion again.

THE END of Magic Potion Series!


This work is the conclusion of the "Magic Potion Series".

Pastel and Claudia are the main characters in the Magic Potion Series.
The story of Pastel's side was completed in the previous work, "Magic Potion Millionaire".
This work, "Magic Potion Liberators," completes the story of Claudia's side.

This is the story of the girls' farewell to the "Witch of Terror," who has played a big impact in their lives. I hope that you will witness the end of the story.

Of course, the story is highly independent and can be enjoyed without knowing the past works.
Even if you have not experienced the series, please look forward to it!
